0: Cluster 0 (150 pitchers) — Splitter Specialist: average FF velocity (94.4 mph, +0.7 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2254 rpm, -16). Arsenal: leans heavily on the splitter (17%, +15%), and avoids the changeup (-8%).
1: Cluster 1 (193 pitchers) — Below-Average Velocity Arm: below-average FF velocity (92.3 mph, -1.5 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2215 rpm, -54). Arsenal: shows a balanced mix led by the four-seamer (30%) and sinker (19%).
2: Cluster 2 (352 pitchers) — Mid-Velocity Craftsman: average FF velocity (94.2 mph, +0.4 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2282 rpm, +13). Arsenal: shows a balanced mix led by the four-seamer (30%) and slider (25%).
3: Cluster 3 (101 pitchers) — Knuckle-Curve Specialist: average FF velocity (93.9 mph, +0.1 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2284 rpm, +15). Arsenal: leans heavily on the knuckle-curve (18%, +17%), and avoids the curveball (-6%).
4: Cluster 4 (73 pitchers) — Sinker Specialist: average SI velocity (93.2 mph, -0.5 vs. league) and below-average SI spin (2158 rpm, -111 vs. league). Arsenal: leans heavily on the sinker (44%, +29%), cutter (16%, +9%), and avoids the four-seamer (-34%).
5: Cluster 5 (293 pitchers) — Mid-Velocity Four-Seamer Arm: average FF velocity (94.0 mph, +0.2 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2278 rpm, +9). Arsenal: leans heavily on the four-seamer (50%, +16%), and avoids the sinker (-15%).
6: Cluster 6 (185 pitchers) — Mid-Velocity Sweeper Arm: average FF velocity (93.7 mph, -0.1 vs. league) and league-average FF spin (2294 rpm, +25). Arsenal: leans heavily on the sweeper (17%, +12%), cutter (13%, +6%), and avoids the slider (-13%).
